description:
No cold fingers on pow days. Windproof, waterproof insulated gloves keep hands toasty and dry whether you're riding the chair, bombing down black diamonds or breaking trail in the backcountry. Waterproof fabric, a DWR finish, taped seams and a FUTURELIGHT™ insert block out snow and water. HeatSeeker insulation and a fleece lining keeps fingers cozy on extra-cold days.Outer shell is waterproof and windproof DryVent 2L with DWR finish and fully taped seams for breathable weather protection.FUTURELIGHT waterproof-breathable insert keeps water out.Polyurethane synthetic leather palms for durability and grip.Etip™ touchscreen compatible fingers allow you to use your devices without removing gloves.200g Heakseeker™ ECO polyester insulation (50% recycled content) on the backs.100g Heatseeker™ ECO insulation on palm.High-pile polyester fleece lining is soft against the skin.Cinchable wrist seals heat in.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: The North Face Montana Futurelight Etip Gloves - Men's
